name: dev-contitional
description: Autonomous Server Application Engine with LLM Integration

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && uvicorn src.app:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && black --check src && isort --check-only src && mypy src
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && black src && isort src
